name: UFGCircuitConnectionComponent
comment:
A scene component used for adding circuit connectors to a building.
A wire can be connected between two connectors, making it a circuit in the circuit subsystem.

methods.name: GetLifetimeReplicatedProps
methods.comment: Begin UActorComponent interface

methods.name: PostLoadGame_Implementation
methods.comment: Begin IFGSaveInterface interface

methods.name: SetIsHidden
methods.comment: Set if this connection is hidden.

methods.name: GetNumConnections
methods.comment: Get the number of connections to this connection, excluding hidden.

methods.name: GetNumHiddenConnections
methods.comment: Get the number of hidden connections to this connection.

methods.name: GetMaxNumConnections
methods.comment: Get the maximum allowed connections to this connection.

methods.name: GetNumFreeConnections
methods.comment: Get How many free connections this connection has.

methods.name: GetConnections
methods.comment:
Get all the connections, excluding hidden connections. Use GetHiddenConnections for that.
@param out_connections Array to append all the connections.

methods.name: GetHiddenConnections
methods.comment:
Get all the hidden connections.
@param out_connections Array to append all the hidden connections.

methods.name: GetWires
methods.comment:
Get all the wires connected to this connection.
@param out_wires Array to append all the wires.

methods.name: AddConnection
methods.comment:
Note: Connections are the wires responsibility, this call only makes it known to us that a connection exists.
Note: Do not call this unless you know what you're doing.

methods.name: RemoveConnection
methods.comment:
Note: Connections are the wires responsibility, this call only makes it known to us that a connection exists.
Note: Do not call this unless you know what you're doing.

methods.name: AddHiddenConnection
methods.comment:
Add a hidden connection to another connection component. One of the connections must be hidden for this to be valid.
Connects both ends of the connection and the circuits.

methods.name: RemoveHiddenConnection
methods.comment:
Remove a hidden connection to another connection component.
Disconnects both ends of the connection and the circuits.

methods.name: ClearHiddenConnections
methods.comment: Clear all hidden connections.

methods.name: IsHidden
methods.comment: Is this a hidden connection, you cannot connect a wire to it but connect it through code.

methods.name: IsConnected
methods.comment: @return true if this is connected to a circuit; false if not connected.

methods.name: GetCircuitID
methods.comment: Get the circuit this is connected to; -1 if not connected to a circuit.

methods.name: OnRep_CircuitIDChanged
methods.comment: Tracks replication changes to mCircuitID

methods.name: DisplayDebug
methods.comment: Debug

methods.name: OnCircuitIDChanged
methods.comment: Called when the circuit ID changes, this can happen at any time when the circuitry is changed, e.g. when circuits are split or merged.

methods.name: ReceiveOnCircuitIDChanged
methods.comment: Called when the circuit changes, this can happen at any time when the circuitry is changed, e.g. when circuits are split or merged.

methods.name: SetCircuitID
methods.comment: Used by the circuit subsystem to update the circuit this is connected to.

properties.comment: How many connections this component can have connected.

properties.name: mIsHiddenConnection
properties.comment: This connection is hidden and can only be connected through the code. E.g. powered walls have a hidden connection all machines connect to.

The circuit this connection is connected to. INDEX_NONE if not connected.
